mapper.select: select id,only_code,parts_code,goods_code,goods_name,model,measure_unit,out_bill_num from wms_outbill_goods where del_flag='0' and out_bill_code=#{outbillGoods.outBillCode}

select goods_code, goods_name, model, (select dict_label from sys_dict_data where dict_type='wms_metering_unit' and dict_value=measure_unit) measure_unit, sum(out_bill_num) out_bill_num from wms_outbill_goods where del_flag='0' and out_bill_code=#{outBillCode} group by goods_code

SELECT distinct a.tray_code trayCode,b.area_id areaCode FROM wms_outbill_goods a left join wms_warehouse_location b on a.location_code = b.location_code
${ew.sqlSegment}
